name: Miinto Feed Generator
author: therightsw

sections.description:
Miinto Feed Generator by The Right Software web development company is a WooCommerce Plugin used to download products information in TSV format for Miinto feeds. This is only for Simple products.
Miinto is a fashion network created for all the fashion-forward consumers who demands the same high level service and experience as when they are shopping at their local shops offline. By providing a Product feed to Miinto, the plugin ensure automatic synchronization of your products to the Miinto Platform.

For more info about WordPress plugin development, visit The Right Software WordPress development services page.
View other WordPress Plugins developed by The Right Software.
Send your problems to hello@therightsw.com. Dont forget to mention WordPress version.

Features:

Create TSV file of Woocommerce Product Feeds for Miinto.

Future Updates:

It will work for variable and composite Woocommerce products.

Features

  • Create TSV file of Woocommerce Product Feeds for Miinto

Support

Visit https://therightsw.com/ for details and enquiries about DLV.
sections.installation:
1. Upload (mfp-miinto-feeds)folder to the /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
